definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: sojourning-place, dwelling-place, sojourning—sf. [[ם]] Ps 55:16; pl. cstr. [[מְגוּרֵי]] Ge 37:1; sf. [[מְגוּרַי]] Ge 47:9, [[מְגוּרָי֑]] Ps 119:54, [[מְגֻרֶיךָ]] Ge 17:8, Ge 28:4, [[מְגוּרָיו]] Job 18:19, [[מְגוּרֵיהֶם]] Ge 36:7 + 2 t. [[מְגֻרֵיהֶם]] Ex 6:4; —dwelling-place Ps 55:16, Job 18:19; —sojourning( -place), always pl. ´[[אֶרֶץ מ]] Ge 17:8, Ge 28:4, Ge 36:7, Ge 37:1, Ex 6:4 (Hex always P) Ez Eze 20:38; sojourning (pl.) = life time, ´[[שְׁנֵי מ]] Ge 47:9 ´[[יְמֵי מ]] Ge 47:9; cf. ´[[בֵּית מ]] Ps 119:54.
